title: How the Assads Stole Syria, Part 3
itunes:title: How the Assads Stole Syria, Part 3
description:
Shereen concludes this short series by explaining how Bashar al-Assad took control of Syria after the death of his father, and how he's continued the Assad family's reign of terror in the country.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
